alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 12:16PM EST until December 21 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. Sandy River At Mercer affecting Somerset and Franklin Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at North Sidney. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Portions of Lithgow Street in Winslow flood to a depth of 3 to 5 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 30.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
